=== Join Our Team ===

To become member of the Ubuntu Malaysia Local Community Team, please
* Subscribe to our <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-my|mailing list]]</nowiki>
* Join <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-my/|our team on Launchpad]]</nowiki>
* Join <nowiki>[[http://forums.ubuntu.com.my/|our forum]]</nowiki>
* Participate and get involved (see "'''How You Can Help'''" and "'''As a Member'''" sections below)

'''NOTE''': New members are encouraged to provide as much information about yourself in your Launchpad / wiki (e-mail and name is compulsory) in order for us to approve your application speedily. This measure is to avoid spamming.

You also can join the #ubuntu-my channel on irc.freenode.net for online discussion.

=== How You Can Help ===

If you would like to support Ubuntu Malaysia Local Community Team, please consider
* donating to us
* spreading the word to your family members, relatives, colleagues, friends, etc

=== As a Member ===

If you would like to get involved with the team efforts, you can help by
* sharing your ideas, knowledge, experience
* promoting events and Ubuntu itself. 
* contribute in updating this wiki pages
* keeping our communication channels (mailing list, irc channel, website and forum) active
* starting or assisting our projects or events
* showing & contributing in team meetups
